title: House7house
author: House7house
content: When lax moneytary policiy and Nice stimulus money markets pumped Nice.Now they do qt instead of qe so they dont print money so we the traders Will take hit.But power is our own hands i Will introduce you guys soon biggest pump and dump channel so we join globally and we dont Care anymore about btc or others our coins Will move either up or down BIG waves.Carefully choosed Hanf picked coins selection to make sure it Will not dump If we pump it so the cant be with too small Market Cap Some well known alt coin might hold up better way the price and dont fall so fast.I need all of you becouse together we can accieve financial freedom.Also the good or bad news Will be published during the pump or dump time of our coin to lure in outsiders by fomo or fud.I guess one coin in 1-2 days Will be enough.About profit: well in Nice pump or dump with 30x leverage If coin can move 20% ITS 20x30= 600% profit.Off course to use leverage ITS a High risk thats why you should move your stop loss to profit so If price goes against your way you dont lose.Times Are trough we the traders need to unite to make money we cant just wait days or weeks when btc doing something we all Are needs and we need daily money.So lets do it together  Remember guys federal reserve started Same way the group of good friends joined together and started to use money to make more money and now ITS a privately owned instution and huge business and provides a LOT capital into money markets and Fed IS the main money suppliers For the wall Street.For the start the Telegram channel Will be created it Will be Free to use For first time to make good profit For Free those who join first. And then we Will be Independent we dont relie on nobody we create our own wealth as a team.Also we dont do the fake calls Like many others acting Like rats dumping on their own members we do hoonest ways with our members.The signal should be with time For example the next signal Will be given out 18:00 London time or other time zone Also we should organize maybe 2 different time zones that For example trader John smith is from USA and trader Vladimir Putin is from russia other one there is day but other one there is early morning 3.00 am people sleep that time we try to make most best time For traders so no matter what geo continent of world u Are u get pretty good time to enter.Also suggest this project with all your friends we Gona be huge this one Will be better then AMC was.Sign here by posting yes or your comment or questions about project Also suggestions.We should have at least 100k+ members to start with then we good.
